posts.post_title: FS/FT - T206 Type 2 Proof, Johnny Bates
posts.post_content:
Taking cash or trade offers for this Type 2 Proof, Johnny Bates. 

What I’m looking for in trade is “key” HOF’er’s, rare back T206’s, Cobb’s, or Babe Ruth’s.
